item.title: Trump 2nd term live updates: Judge denies effort to block DOGE from DOL data access
item.description: President Donald Trump has begun his second administration with a series of controversial moves and decisions.

item.title: Judge blocks Trump administration from placing 2,200 USAID employees on leave
item.description: A federal judge blocked the Trump administration from orchestrating its plan to place more than 2,000 USAID employees on leave at midnight.

item.title: Major cancer research group calls on Trump administration to restore data access
item.description: The American Cancer Society is calling on the Trump administration to restore access to comprehensive scientific data.

item.title: Wreckage of missing Alaska plane located, all 10 believed to be dead: Coast Guard
item.description: Crews in Nome, Alaska, were conducting search-and-rescue operations after the report of a missing Bering Air caravan with 10 people aboard.

item.title: Democrats demand probe into Musk's alleged 'conflicts' over billions in fed contracts
